description: upply of Electrical & Electronic Products for the Department of National Defence for the Province of New Brunswick expedited by CFTA, CFTA-CH, CFTA-COL, CKFTA, NAFTA, CPFTA and CCP. The deadline is on April 9, 2023, which has already expired. Tentative date for contract award is , May, 2023. A bid from a qualified source was closed on March 24, 2023.
full_summary:
================================

**Electrical Products (New Brunswick) - Government Tender Announcement**

**Reference Number:** cb-4722-247454
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-28T13:00:00
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-05-01
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-03-31

**Procurement Overview:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply of various electrical products. This requirement is open only to participants who hold a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under contract E60HN-16ELEC.

**Eligibility:**

Invited participants include the following companies:

* Anixter Canada Inc.
* Graybar Canada
* Nedco-Rexel
* Wesco 
* Lumen
* Eddy Group
* KGPCo
* Newark Element 14
* Westburne-Rexel
* ECS Electrical
* Bird Stairs
* KVA Protection
* RS Americas (Canada)
* Axsera
* Keverest

**Contract Summary:**

* **Description of Requirement:** DND requires various electrical supplies to meet the needs of its operations.
* **Duration:** The proposed contract is for an 11-month period, with all deliverables requested no later than March 31, 2024.
* **File Number:** W2037-24-0007

**Contracting Authority Contact Information:**

* Name: Nicole Shannon
* Email: nicole.shannon@forces.gc.ca
* Phone Number: (506) 422-7075
* Fax Number: Not provided

**Important Notes:**

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* This tender is for the Department of National Defence only.
* The tender closing date is [2023-04-28T13:00:00].
